txt.en:
'Ah, so you want to give it a try? It's not easy, I'll tell you that! You've seen the ice sculptures in Winter-home, have you not? My work is brilliant, at least most of the time...

'I'll admit, I've been having more trouble with this project than my last. I simply can't keep this field filled and the mayor is getting frustrated. Whether it's the winter conditions or some of those blasted snow-beasts, my snowmen keep getting destroyed.

'It's hard to stay passionate when your work is wrecked every single day. Maybe you can help though. See if you can craft more of my snowmen and make this field an amazing sight to behold!'

'I like the way you work. Your work is almost as good as mine...maybe you can help me out some more tomorrow. I'm sure if you keep trying, you can do even better!\n\n'Here are some coins for your hard work.'
'Well, which one do you want to build?'

Virgil Greenfield needs help filling out the snowman field outside of Winter-home. He has directed you to try your hand at crafting one of his snowmen.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
In the field outside of Winter-home, select the style of snowman you'd like to build.
